location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Simla to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the differences between Rajputana [Rājasthān] affairs and Persian Gulf affairs; Aitchison's impressions of the Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] Chief; mail robberies in Jeypore [Jaipur]; the success of the Durbar in Ajmere [Ajmer]; news of happenings in the Gulf; trouble with the Turks at Aden; and giving news of his wife Beatrice and their daughters.
